title: Bird Magics
description: This is an alternate-cover edition for ASIN B004QGYDRK.Ulak is a crow. A berry addict and eccentric in the crow community living in the courtyard behind a row of white houses, he decides one day that the humans have to die. Convinced he knows the secret to making this happen, he shares his ambitions with his two friends, Fark and Jaak. They, of course, think heâ€™s nuts...at least until the white lights begin to appear in the sky.
author: J.C. Andrijeski
